text: Eugenio Duca (27 February 1950 â€“ 5 October 2021) was an Italian politician. He was born in Ancona, Italy. He was a member of the Democratic Party of the Left. Between 1994 until 2006, Duca was a Member of the Chamber of Deputies of Italy. Duca died on 5 October 2021, in Ancona from a heart attack, aged 71. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Marche
title: Eugenio Duca
